code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Navbar from"./Navbar";import Cards from"./Cards";import axios from"axios";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import CardsSeries from"./CardsSeries";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MaListeSérie=()=>{const[listData,setListData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{let moviesId=window.localStorage.series?window.localStorage.series.split(","):[];for(let i=0;i<moviesId.length;i++){axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/tv/"+moviesId[i]+"?api_key=ed82f4c18f2964e75117c2dc65e2161d&language=fr-FR").then(res=>setListData(listData=>[...listData,res.data]));}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fav-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Ma liste de s\xE9ries"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"catalogue",children:listData.length>0?listData.filter((item,index)=>{return index===listData.findIndex(item2=>item2.id===item.id);}).map((movie,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/SeriesPopulaires/".concat(movie.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardsSeries,{movie:movie},index)})):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:" Aucune s\xE9rie \xE0 votre liste"})})]});};export default MaListeSérie;
